findings.title: Timely Pool Update Upon Weight Change in CorePool/FlashPool
findings.description: The staking contracts do not timely update the accounting of related staking rewards or revenue when the pool weight is updated.

findings.title: Proper Migration in CorePool::moveFundsFromWallet()
findings.description: The current implementation of the moveFundsFromWallet() function needs to be improved as it simply removes the stakes from the migrating user without properly migrating them.

findings.title: Proper Stake Weight Calculation in CorePool::stake()
findings.description: The current implementation of stake weight calculation in the stake() function can be improved for proper stake weight calculation.

findings.title: Just-In-Time Pair Pool Balance For Extra ILV Rewards
findings.description: The revenue distribution logic in the `sendILVRewards()` function may be abused to provide just-in-time balance and cause unfair revenue distribution.

findings.title: Removal of Redundant State/Code
findings.description: The `CorePool` contract has unnecessary redundancies that can be safely removed, such as a specific validation in the `stake()` function that is always evaluated to be false.

findings.title: 3.6 Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: Privileged accounts have critical roles in governing and regulating system-wide operations, posing a counter-party risk to contract users.
